pages.text: It's generally hard to fully cook unprocessed ingredints as whole, and that's why there is a thing called "cutting board" (or "chopping board", in Cuisine Mod). Left-clicking and right-clicking the board with kitchen knife will cut ingredients into various forms. Note that some ingredients may not exist in a certain form.$(br2)To place ingredients onto board, simply right click the

board with those ingredients held in hand.$(br2)You can also chop wood logs into planks on chopping board using an axe. $(br)Right click with items to put them onto chopping board. To chop things, left click chopping board with axe. There is a cool-down period after each item being chopped. The harvest level of axe will affect the chopping efficiency! Tip:  put inputs in off-hand helps re-supplying inputs to chopping board.
